attributes.title: horrific!!!!!!!
attributes.review:
it took 4 hours to download and i have good wifi and my storage isnâ€™t even near full!!!!! and when i opened that app it kept glitching and all i could see what this big orange tangerine with hay on the top!!!!! after having it opened for a minute or two my phone crashed!!! it turned completely off! and when it turned back on my lock and home screen was turned into the glitchy tangerine with the hay on the top!!!! and i was confused so i closed the app and re opened it! and after i open it i see a picture of "the annoying orange" dressed up as a business man!!!! and audio was playing and it just kept repeating "china china china china" and the "annoying orange"s laugh in the background! and my phone started to heat up a lot so i had to close out of the app! but the audio was still playing!!!!!?????? i had to restart my phone again for it to stop, i could never get past the loading screen because of all of this nonsense!!!! 
0/10, would not eat here again even if it made me a millionaire 
:(

attributes.title: THIS APP STINKS
attributes.review: i tried to download this app and it took 2 WEEKS AND 5 DAYS. finally after i downloaded it it played this horrible music that i couldnâ€™t turn off. then it asked for personal information like my address and credit card! but i gave it and then all my money on my credit card was gone and the money was spent on electronics! but this is the worst part and im crying typing this. somebody broke into my house without me knowing and put a bomb in it! luckily after he left i defused it and then called the cops. they said that i signed up for this and told me if i called the cops again they would torture me because im BLACK!! dont download this app because it is cursed and it will ruin your life.
